Danis.synopsis: Danis' dialog in Haven after his rescue.He has made it safely to Haven after escaping Moonrise Towers and has been reunited with Bex, his partner, if she's alive, or is alone if she's not. If she's alive, the player witnessed a really cute reunion between them, and these dialogues cover Danis' followups to that conversation, as well as versions for if he's alone and for a few states in Haven. Not all states are covered since Danis doesn't care much about Ketheric

AD_Alone.synopsis: Bex stands alone and in despair by the river, fearing she may never see her lover Danis again.
AD_Alone.how_to_trigger: Bex is alone in Haven. Danis is MIA.

Bex.synopsis: Bex is hanging out by the bridge outside the Last Light alone. She's trying to get a few moments to herself to mourn, convinced that her boyfriend Danis is dead. The player can offer to help or alternatively blame her for how things unfolded (thus souring any future interactions).
Bex.how_to_trigger: Go to Haven -> Use debug book -> Act 2 setup -> Tiefling path (Go through the main entrance gate and down the path on your right - Bex is just through the bridge)

AD_Reunited.synopsis: Bex and Danis are finally reunited (and ecstatic to see each other again).
AD_Reunited.how_to_trigger: Go to Haven -> Use debug book -> Act 2 setup -> Tiefling path Ctrl+Shift+F11 -> oe prisonersreturn(Go through the main entrance gate and down the path on your right - Bex is just through the bridge, where she is joined by Danis after oe prisonersreturn runs its course)

Reunited.synopsis: Danis and Bex are reunited in the Last Light Inn after the player has saved Danis from being trapped in MOO. The two are ecstatic to see one another for the first time in a long time and very grateful to the player.
Reunited.how_to_trigger: Go to Haven -> Use debug book -> Act 2 setup -> Tiefling path Ctrl+Shift+F11 -> oe prisonersreturn(Go through the main entrance gate and down the path on your right - Bex is just through the bridge, where she is joined by Danis after oe prisonersreturn runs its course)

AD_Promenade.synopsis: Bex and Danis walk around Haven taking in the sights after having been reuinited.
AD_Promenade.how_to_trigger: Go to Haven -> Use debug book -> Act 2 setup -> Tiefling path Ctrl+Shift+F11 -> oe prisonersreturn(Go through the main entrance gate and down the path on your right - Bex is just through the bridge, where she is joined by Danis after oe prisonersreturn runs its course)

AD_StartLoverPromenade.synopsis: Bex and Danis just before setting off for a walk around Haven after being reunited.
AD_StartLoverPromenade.how_to_trigger: Go to Haven -> Use debug book -> Act 2 setup -> Tiefling path Ctrl+Shift+F11 -> oe prisonersreturn(Go through the main entrance gate and down the path on your right - Bex is just through the bridge, where she is joined by Danis after oe prisonersreturn runs its course)

Danis_0.speaker: Danis
Danis_0.text: I owe you my life. That's not a debt I'll soon forget. Thank you.
Danis_0.context: NodeContext: Fallback - Danis is grateful to the player for saving him, but not ebullient. A slight chill to him.

Danis_2.speaker: Danis
Danis_2.text: I just want to make it to Baldur's Gate. We've come this far, right? Just a little longer yet.

Danis_3.speaker: Danis
Danis_3.text: Bex said the gods sent you to us. I think she's right.
Danis_3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

Danis_4.speaker: Danis
Danis_4.text: It's good to have you here. Thanks for everything you've done.
Danis_4.context: NodeContext: Bex is dead, Danis is trying to come back to reality.

Danis_5.speaker: Danis
Danis_5.text: Thank you for saving us - again. I'm never leaving Bex's side again. Never ever.
Danis_5.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

Danis_6.speaker: Danis
Danis_6.text: Bex isn't easily offended, so gods know what you said to upset her so much.
Danis_6.context: NodeContext: If the player really offended Bex earlier, Danis reacts. He's still grateful to the player, but wary now.

Danis_9.speaker: Danis
Danis_9.text: After everything you've done for us, she'll come around eventually, I'm sure.

Danis_7.speaker: Danis
Danis_7.text: It isn't the same here - not without Bex. Gods... if I could just hold her in my arms one more time.
Danis_7.context: NodeContext: Active, teary grief. Bex died before Danis could have a reunion with her.

Danis_8.speaker: Danis
Danis_8.text: She's dead. Bex. How can she be dead? After everything - Elturel, the druids, this place. It makes no sense at all.
Danis_8.context: NodeContext: Danis and Bex reunited, then Bex was killed at some point. Danis is cold and icy in his grief.

Danis_10.speaker: Danis
Danis_10.context: NodeContext: If the player really offended Bex earlier, Danis reacts. He's still grateful to the player, but wary now.

AD_Alone_2.speaker: Bex
AD_Alone_2.text: What am I going to do?

Bex_0.speaker: Bex
Bex_0.text: Danis still hasn't come back. None of them have.
Bex_0.context: NodeContext: Utterly crushed as her worst fears are confirmed

Bex_5.speaker: Player
Bex_5.text: I tried my best, but nobody else made it - I'm sorry.

Bex_41.speaker: Bex
Bex_41.context: NodeContext: Crumbling as the wave of sadness hits her

Bex_10.speaker: Bex
Bex_10.context: NodeContext: In a state of shock and grief following Danis' death; tearful

Bex_18.speaker: Bex
Bex_18.text: Danis didn't make it back, did he?
Bex_18.context: NodeContext: Utterly crushed as her worst fears are confirmed

Bex_11.speaker: Player
Bex_11.text: I'm sorry - we got out as many as we could.

Bex_1.speaker: Bex
Bex_1.text: I know. And I know it was only thanks to you that we made it out of the Grove in the first place.
Bex_1.context: NodeContext: Trying to be gracious and hold it together (not very well)

Bex_19.speaker: Bex
Bex_19.text: We were going to open a teahouse together in Baldur's Gate.

Bex_27.speaker: Bex
Bex_27.text: I was going to ask him to marry me!

Bex_67.speaker: Bex
Bex_67.text: I don't know what to do now.

Bex_15.speaker: Player
Bex_15.text: The Towers are a terrible place. We're lucky anyone made it out alive.

Bex_57.speaker: Bex
Bex_57.context: NodeContext: Trying to hold it together

Bex_34.speaker: Player
Bex_34.text: To be fair, he's probably better off dead than abandoned in Moonrise Towers.

Bex_24.speaker: Bex
Bex_24.text: Please, I just want to be alone.
Bex_24.context: NodeContext: Bex bites back tears after being interrupted

Bex_43.speaker: Player
Bex_43.text: You ought to be careful - there are dangerous people about.
Bex_43.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

Bex_16.speaker: Player
Bex_16.text: I remember you - Bex, right? Where's your man?

Bex_3.speaker: Bex
Bex_3.context: NodeContext: A stab of despair, almost a wail

Bex_39.speaker: Bex
Bex_39.text: Cultists... It was so dark I didn't realise until the children started screaming.
Bex_39.context: NodeContext: Trying not to cry again as she starts to explain

Bex_29.speaker: Bex
Bex_29.text: They rounded us up... cut us up... Said they were taking whoever could still walk to Moonrise Towers.
Bex_29.context: NodeContext: Getting increasingly distressed and closer to tears

Bex_2.speaker: Bex
Bex_2.text: I managed to get away, but my love Danis... Mar zindur vroshan.
Bex_2.context: NodeContext: Voice cracking on the final sentence - proununciation of infernal "Mar zinDOOR vroSHAN" meaning "may he rest in peace".

Bex_51.speaker: Player
Bex_51.text: How did you manage to get away?

Bex_44.speaker: Bex
Bex_44.text: I've always been good at running - unlike Danis.
Bex_44.context: NodeContext: The vaguest note of humour on "unlike Danis"

Bex_62.speaker: Bex
Bex_62.text: I didn't realise one day our lives would depend on it.

Bex_56.speaker: Bex
Bex_56.text: If they didn't kill him when we ran, they probably will once they get to Moonrise.
Bex_56.context: NodeContext: Slight bitterness through the sadness

Bex_37.speaker: Player
Bex_37.text: It sounds like he meant a lot to you.

Bex_20.speaker: Bex
Bex_20.text: I just wish I could have said goodbye.
Bex_20.context: NodeContext: Can clearly feel herself about to start crying again

Bex_54.speaker: Player
Bex_54.text: Is there anything I can do to help?

Bex_33.speaker: Bex
Bex_33.text: Not unless you can bring him back.
Bex_33.context: NodeContext: Resigned, almost a little annoyed at the player for asking such a stupid question through her sadness

Bex_38.speaker: Bex
Bex_38.context: NodeContext: Slightly stand-offish through the sadness - but still a tentative glimmer of hope

Bex_47.speaker: Player
Bex_47.text: Danis could still be alive - don't give up on him yet.

Bex_36.speaker: Bex
Bex_36.text: Do you really think so? By the gods, I hope you're right.
Bex_36.context: NodeContext: Tentatively hopeful through her sadness

Bex_28.speaker: Bex
Bex_28.text: I wish I hadn't let go of him.
Bex_28.context: NodeContext: Voice cracking; she thinks it's her fault

Bex_23.speaker: Player
Bex_23.text: I'll find Danis and bring him back to you.

Bex_8.speaker: Bex
Bex_8.text: It's hard to imagine him making it after everything that happened, but if you find him...
Bex_8.context: NodeContext: Tentatively hopefuly (but still sniffly from tears)

Bex_66.speaker: Bex
Bex_66.text: It would mean the world to me.
Bex_66.context: NodeContext: Sincere, voice trembling as if she's about to start crying again

Bex_68.speaker: Player
Bex_68.text: I'll do my best to find him, but I can't promise anything.

Bex_13.speaker: Player
Bex_13.text: He is still locked in a cultist's tower - he might be better off dead.

Bex_63.speaker: Bex
Bex_63.text: I know what you're saying is true, but...
Bex_63.context: NodeContext: Clearly starting to tear up again

Bex_42.speaker: Bex
Bex_42.text: Please. I don't want to think about it.

Bex_32.speaker: Player
Bex_32.text: By the gods, I promise you I'll bring Danis back safely.

Bex_9.speaker: Player
Bex_9.text: From what I've heard, they've probably killed and eaten him. In that order, if he's lucky.

Bex_65.speaker: Bex
Bex_65.context: NodeContext: Surprise and anger momentarily cuts through her sadness

Bex_4.speaker: Player
Bex_4.text: Sounds like your boy toy's goblin chow.

Bex_22.speaker: Player
Bex_22.text: So what you're saying is you saved yourself and left your soulmate to die?

Bex_49.speaker: Bex
Bex_49.text: Really? Fine, fine. I'm Bex - I was travelling to Baldur's Gate.
Bex_49.context: NodeContext: Trying to pull herself together to explain after being interrupted mid-cry

Bex_61.speaker: Player
Bex_61.text: Stop snivelling and tell me what's wrong, then.

Bex_48.speaker: Bex
Bex_48.context: NodeContext: Attempting to gather herself to explain

Bex_26.speaker: Bex
Bex_26.text: Stay alive a little longer, and we may all find ourselves en route to the city. Would you believe it?

Bex_30.speaker: Bex
Bex_30.text: I wish I hadn't left him behind.

Bex_35.speaker: Bex
Bex_35.text: Oh - you! I almost didn't recognise you. Glad you made it. But I don't know how much longer we'll be here. Something's... happening.

Bex_58.speaker: Bex
Bex_58.text: Thank you for bringing Danis back to me - I really don't know what I'd do without him.
Bex_58.context: NodeContext: Emotionally exhausted but sincerely grateful

Bex_64.speaker: Bex
Bex_64.text: You're still going to kill that madman, aren't you? There's enough evil to go around without him.

AD_Reunited_0.speaker: Danis
AD_Reunited_0.text: I can't believe it. To see you again with my own eyes. To hold you...
AD_Reunited_0.context: NodeContext: Increasingly emotional with each sentence, quivering on the brink of (happy) tears on the last

AD_Reunited_5.speaker: Bex
AD_Reunited_5.context: NodeContext: Clearly about to cry herself

AD_Reunited_1.speaker: Danis
AD_Reunited_1.context: NodeContext: Still exhausted but with a note of humour

AD_Reunited_8.speaker: Bex
AD_Reunited_8.context: NodeContext: Almost laughing despite herself/the situation

AD_Reunited_3.speaker: Bex
AD_Reunited_3.text: Perhaps we should dunk you in the Chionthar...
AD_Reunited_3.context: NodeContext: Warm - and jokey despite herself/everything tha's happened

AD_Reunited_6.speaker: Danis
AD_Reunited_6.context: NodeContext: Exhausted but ecstatic to see his girlfriend again following his escape

AD_Reunited_2.speaker: Bex
AD_Reunited_2.context: NodeContext: Can barely believe it's him

AD_Reunited_9.speaker: Danis
AD_Reunited_9.context: NodeContext: Greatly relieved, voice cracking slightly; it sounds like he's about to cry

AD_Reunited_7.speaker: Bex
AD_Reunited_7.text: I missed you so much! When I heard the screams, I thought... I thought...
AD_Reunited_7.context: NodeContext: Effusive on the first sentence, slowly turning to a traumatised sadness as the second wears on

AD_Reunited_11.speaker: Danis
AD_Reunited_11.text: I thought the worst, too - but now we're together again none of that matters.

AD_Reunited_4.speaker: Bex
AD_Reunited_4.text: Don't you ever get yourself captured again!
AD_Reunited_4.context: NodeContext: Mock scolding - emotional and a little drained, but happy

Reunited_31.speaker: Bex
Reunited_31.text: You're all right. My gods, you're all right!
Reunited_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Danis and Bex facing each other

Reunited_10.speaker: Danis
Reunited_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Danis and Bex embrace completely. They are so fckn happy to be reunited after Danis was taken to MOO. They end their hug and gaze into each others' eyes at the end of the node

Reunited_11.speaker: Bex
Reunited_11.text: I was so scared I'd lost you.

Reunited_38.speaker: Danis
Reunited_38.text: Me too. But we're here now. Safe.

Reunited_18.speaker: Player
Reunited_18.text: I wouldn't get too comfortable - it won't be safe here forever.

Reunited_43.speaker: Player
Reunited_43.text: It's wonderful to see you two back together.

Reunited_39.speaker: Danis
Reunited_39.text: Let me get a good look at you. My gods, Bex. I can't believe we almost lost each other.
Reunited_39.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Danis puts a hand on Bex's arm and lets his eyes search her face.
Return to initial state after "My gods, Bex."NodeContext: Recovering from his emotions, cheering up momentarily, then coming back into the gravity of the situation.

Reunited_48.speaker: Bex
Reunited_48.text: Never again. You hear me? Never.

Reunited_1.speaker: Player
Reunited_1.text: Don't get too comfortable. We won't be safe here for long.

Reunited_45.speaker: Bex
Reunited_45.text: I'd be much more comfortable if you'd leave us the hells alone.
Reunited_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Bex spots you and steps toward the player angrily.NodeContext: Angry. Player has intruded on a private moment and Bex hates the player in this permutation

Reunited_36.speaker: Danis
Reunited_36.text: Whoa! Darling, this is the person who helped me escape that wretched place.
Reunited_36.context: NodeContext: pleading the player's case, surprised by Bex's reaction

Reunited_24.speaker: Bex
Reunited_24.text: It's hard to believe. You were so callous, I didn't think you gave a damn about us. And yet you helped us - again. Why?
Reunited_24.context: NodeContext: Talking to player, confused - they spoke to you harshly and cruelly earlier, but just found out they saved your partner's life

Reunited_5.speaker: Bex
Reunited_5.text: Maybe not. But we have each other now. We have this moment now - thanks to you.
Reunited_5.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Maybe not." addressed to the player.
"But we have each other now." turns back to Danis
Bex takes one of Danis's hands on "this *moment*"

Reunited_20.speaker: Player
Reunited_20.text: A beautiful sight, and all thanks to me.

Reunited_22.speaker: Danis
Reunited_22.text: Credit where it's due - Bex, this is the one who helped me and the others escape.
Reunited_22.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Credit where it's due" turns to player
"Bex' - Danis places hand on Bex's shoulder and looks at her
"This is the one who helped me" alternates between player and Bex to make introductionsNodeContext: With a chuckle, super happy and amused by the player even though player's being a prick

Reunited_19.speaker: Bex
Reunited_19.text: This isn't the first time you've helped us - saved our lives, really. Why?
Reunited_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Bex breaks away and steps toward player, looks at them closely.

Reunited_2.speaker: Player
Reunited_2.text: You were in trouble - I wanted to help. Simple as that.

Reunited_34.speaker: Bex
Reunited_34.text: You make it sound so easy. But I know the lengths you've gone to on our behalf.

Reunited_47.speaker: Bex
Reunited_47.text: You might have the manners of an imp, but you have a noble heart. Thank you.

Reunited_25.speaker: Bex
Reunited_25.text: We'll never forget it. Never ever.
Reunited_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Bex brings a hand to her heartNodeContext: Very heartfelt and sincere

Reunited_42.speaker: Danis
Reunited_42.text: Here we're fighting for our lives and you're working on your memoir. Well - I'll take it, after all you've done.
Reunited_42.context: NodeContext: With a chuckle. Danis is inveterately good-natured and is kind of having the bants with the player. Softens into sincerity toward the end.

Reunited_9.speaker: Player
Reunited_9.text: It was convenient. Next time, it might not be.

Reunited_33.speaker: Bex
Reunited_33.text: Let's hope there is no next time.
Reunited_33.context: NodeContext: With a chuckle. Danis is inveterately good-natured and is simple sincere here.

Reunited_37.speaker: Player
Reunited_37.text: I could ask myself the same question.

Reunited_30.speaker: Danis
Reunited_30.text: Whatever your motivation, we're grateful. We've had a tough row to hoe - but thanks to you, we just might make it.

Reunited_4.speaker: Bex
Reunited_4.context: NodeContext: As heartfelt and sincere as 3 words can be.

Reunited_7.speaker: Player
Reunited_7.text: It was the right thing to do.

Reunited_32.speaker: Bex
Reunited_32.text: You might have the manners of an imp, but I believe you're the noblest person I've ever known.

Reunited_16.speaker: Bex
Reunited_16.text: How lucky we are to have met you. I believe you're the noblest person I've ever known.

Reunited_29.speaker: Danis
Reunited_29.context: NodeContext: Mock hurt, as in 'I thought I was the noblest person you've ever known'

Reunited_3.speaker: Bex
Reunited_3.text: You are. And we'll never forget it - never ever.
Reunited_3.context: NodeContext: Smiling about silly Danis making a joke of everything. Stage whisper the 'You are'.

Reunited_12.speaker: Bex
Reunited_12.text: Here - take these for the road. It's the least I can do.
Reunited_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands the player an item off-camera

Reunited_15.speaker: Bex
Reunited_15.context: NodeContext: With a smile, accepting the player's remote reason for helping them. She's sincere and grateful.

Reunited_35.speaker: Danis
Reunited_35.text: Thanks aren't enough, but we'll give them anyway. Every day, for the rest of our very long lives.
Reunited_35.context: NodeContext: With a twinkle in his eye. He's grateful to the player.

AD_Promenade_0.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_0.text: This place isn't much, but it's home now I'm here with you.
AD_Promenade_0.context: NodeContext: Almost apologetic for the run-down place they're staying, but great, warm gladness that Danis is here with her now

AD_Promenade_6.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_6.context: NodeContext: Sounds like she might be welling up to cry again

AD_Promenade_11.speaker: Danis
AD_Promenade_11.text: Please don't start crying again - then I'll cry.
AD_Promenade_11.context: NodeContext: Comforting (and genuinely worried he might also start crying)

AD_Promenade_1.speaker: Danis
AD_Promenade_1.text: Don't worry - we'll just sail all the way down the Chionthar to Baldur's Gate!
AD_Promenade_1.context: NodeContext: Trying to cheer Bex up by joking around a little

AD_Promenade_3.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_3.context: NodeContext: Deeply affectionate - she appreciates him trying to cheer her up

AD_Promenade_5.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_5.text: I hope we get there. Together.
AD_Promenade_5.context: NodeContext: Tentatively positive they'll reach Baldur's Gate (and great, warm emphasis on "together")

AD_Promenade_7.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_7.context: NodeContext: Awed; she's been marooned in this cursed place for a while now and it still quietly terrifies her

AD_Promenade_2.speaker: Danis
AD_Promenade_2.text: It must have been quite a view before the curse.
AD_Promenade_2.context: NodeContext: Trying to lighten the mood; he's mainly just glad to be back with Bex

AD_Promenade_10.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_10.text: Well, at least there are still flowers here!
AD_Promenade_10.context: NodeContext: Trying to match Danis's valiant attempt at brightening the mood

AD_Promenade_13.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_13.context: NodeContext: Amused/almost laughing at his absurd proposition

AD_Promenade_4.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_4.text: You do still need that bath, though...
AD_Promenade_4.context: NodeContext: Playful/warm/jokey; he definitely needs a wash after all he's been through (but she forgives him for the funk)

AD_Promenade_14.speaker: Danis
AD_Promenade_14.text: Spend a long time moping down here, did you?

AD_Promenade_12.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_12.text: I couldn't bear to be around the others.

AD_Promenade_8.speaker: Bex
AD_Promenade_8.text: They all seemed to be coping so much better than I was.

AD_StartLoverPromenade_1.speaker: Bex
AD_StartLoverPromenade_1.text: So... shall we go for a walk?

AD_StartLoverPromenade_0.speaker: Danis
AD_StartLoverPromenade_0.text: Anywhere, my love - I go where you go.
